text: Va cun ʙa on kofirone, ki halol kardai Allohro harom sumoridand gujand, ki ʙa on ci Alloh nozil kardaast va ʙa pajomʙar ruj ovared, to ki ʙarojaton halol va haromro ʙajon kunad gujand: «On dine, ki padaroni xudro pajravi on joftaem, moro ʙas ast». Harcande, ki padaronason cize az aql nadosta va roh gum karda ʙosand
